languages.text: "Ты готов отречься от знаний только потому что тебе страшно нарушить одно жалкое правило? Подумай о возможностях — постичь технологии ксеносов, чтобы обратить их против их же создателей!"

traits.locale_text: "Ты готов отречься от знаний только потому что тебе страшно нарушить одно жалкое правило? Подумай о возможностях — постичь технологии ксеносов, чтобы обратить их против их же создателей!"

languages.text: "Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"
languages.original_text: "Ты готов отречься от знаний только потому что тебе страшно нарушить одно жалкое правило? Подумай о возможностях — постичь технологии ксеносов, чтобы обратить их против их же создателей!"

traits.locale_text: "You would reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

"You would reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

"Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

"Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

"Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

"Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

languages.text: 「バカげたルールをひとつ破ることが怖いというだけで、知識を拒絶するのか？可能性を考えてみてくれ。あなたは異種族を理解し、それを創造主に対して使うことができるのだぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

traits.locale_text: 「バカげたルールをひとつ破ることが怖いというだけで、知識を拒絶するのか？可能性を考えてみてくれ。あなたは異種族を理解し、それを創造主に対して使うことができるのだぞ！」

languages.text: “你真的打算拒绝这些知识吗？仅仅是因为这么做打破那些可怜的规则吗？想想新的可能性吧！你说不定可以理解异形的技术，使用这些技术对付它们的创造者！”
languages.original_text: "Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

traits.locale_text: “你真的打算拒绝这些知识吗？仅仅是因为这么做打破那些可怜的规则吗？想想新的可能性吧！你说不定可以理解异形的技术，使用这些技术对付它们的创造者！”

languages.text: «¿Rechazaría el conocimiento simplemente porque la idea de romper una patética regla le asusta? Piense en las posibilidades: ¡podría comprender la tecnología de los xenos y utilizarla contra sus creadores!».
languages.original_text: "Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Rechazaría el conocimiento simplemente porque la idea de romper una patética regla le asusta? Piense en las posibilidades: ¡podría comprender la tecnología de los xenos y utilizarla contra sus creadores!».

languages.text: "Würdet Ihr Wissen ablehnen, einfach nur weil Euch der Gedanke solche Angst macht, eine einzige erbärmliche Regel zu brechen? Bedenkt die Möglichkeiten: Ihr könntet die Technologie der Xenos begreifen und sie gegen ihre Schöpfer einsetzen!"
languages.original_text: "Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

traits.locale_text: "Würdet Ihr Wissen ablehnen, einfach nur weil Euch der Gedanke solche Angst macht, eine einzige erbärmliche Regel zu brechen? Bedenkt die Möglichkeiten: Ihr könntet die Technologie der Xenos begreifen und sie gegen ihre Schöpfer einsetzen!"

languages.text: « Vous seriez donc prêt à rejeter de la connaissance uniquement parce que vous avez peur d'enfreindre une règle ridicule ? Imaginez toutes les possibilités qui s'offrent à vous : vous pourriez élucider le mystère de la technologie xénos et l'utiliser contre ses créateurs ! »
languages.original_text: "Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous seriez donc prêt à rejeter de la connaissance uniquement parce que vous avez peur d'enfreindre une règle ridicule ? Imaginez toutes les possibilités qui s'offrent à vous : vous pourriez élucider le mystère de la technologie xénos et l'utiliser contre ses créateurs ! »

languages.text: "Tek bir değersiz kuralı çiğnemekten korktuğun için bilgi elde etmeye karşı mı çıkıyorsun? Olasılıkları göz önünde bulundursana: Zenoların teknolojilerini idrak edip onlara karşı kullanabilirsin!"
languages.original_text: "Would you reject knowledge simply because the thought of breaking one pathetic rule frightened you? Think of the possibilities: you could comprehend the technology of the xenos and use it against its creators!"

traits.locale_text: "Tek bir değersiz kuralı çiğnemekten korktuğun için bilgi elde etmeye karşı mı çıkıyorsun? Olasılıkları göz önünde bulundursana: Zenoların teknolojilerini idrak edip onlara karşı kullanabilirsin!"
